# post(element:notification:)

**Type Method**

Sends a notification to any observing assistive apps.

## Declaration

```swift
static func post(element: Any, notification: NSAccessibility.Notification)
```

## Discussion

Sends `notification` to any assistive applications that register to receive the notification from the user interface object `element` in your app. Accessibility notifications require special handling, so they can’t post using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter].

## Posting Notifications

- **post(element:notification:userInfo:)**: Sends a notification and an optional user info dictionary to any observing assistive apps.
